My friend and I have been traveling through Barcelona now, just finishing our fourth full day.  Normally, I'd be yelping after every meal, but the restaurants here have been so mediocre that until this evening, I've had no urge to write a review.  This restaurant changed this.Coming from New York, we have been disappointed by the overall lack of variety in food here.  But Tenorio was a perfect meal, in every way.  We stumbled on it because we got out of bed late, and it was around midnight...things were all closed.  This place was open, and we were starving.  We were greeted by their staff.  It took a while for someone to come to our table, but he really took care of us.  No pressure sell, no hassle.  No gotchas.  We had 3 entrees and two were amazing (entrecote steak, macarroni bolognese), and one was just very good.  (chicken terriaki).  The cappuccino was among the best we've had, and the tiramisu was light and just right.And also very much worth mentioning -- this was by far the best deal we've had so far in Barcelona.  The food here is expensive, but this place under-charges and over-delivers.  Going back tomorrow.
